tool_description: CityInfoAPI is a RESTful API that provides information about cities around the world.
name: CityDataBox
title: CityDataBox

api_list.name: Get city by latitude & longitude
api_list.description: Retrieves information about a city with the specified latitude and longitude
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://citydatabox1.p.rapidapi.com/city/lat/-23.55/lng/-46.6333"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "citydatabox1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://citydatabox1.p.rapidapi.com/city/lat/{latitude}/lng/{longitude}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "citydatabox1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get city by iso2
api_list.description: Retrieves information about a country with the specified ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://citydatabox1.p.rapidapi.com/country/iso2/ES"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "citydatabox1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a list of cities
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of all cities in the database (max result = 100 per page)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://citydatabox1.p.rapidapi.com/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "citydatabox1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get details by city name
api_list.description: Retrieves information about a city with the specified name

api_list.name: Get city by iso3

        }
